item.dc:creator: @kickyamom50 kickyamom50
item.description:
@kickyamom50 wrote:

Okay in my game your character is some gay thing and you don’t get to choose your looks in the beginning, i tryed both make-up mage npc’s and they’re not added, anyone got a tut or sumthin on how to add please?

Okay, i have ge and everything, but atm it only works as a bank, anyone have a tutorial on adding ge with interfaces and stuff???please i REALLY want this

anyone have the commands for, ::teleall, ::npcreset, or ::npc, or ::pnpc???

When someone in my game dies, they don’t lose anything, i want them to lose all but 3 items, help???

I need the following command to be for mods+ only, can someone plleeeasseeeee help??

else if(cmd[0].equals("::item")) { if(cmd.length == 2 || cmd.length == 3) { int item = Integer.valueOf(cmd[1]); int amount = 1; if(cmd.length == 3) { amount = Integer.valueOf(cmd[2]); }

Add me on msn if i am not on this please!please like really…i am very stumped, please heelllp kickyamom@gmail.com

Read full topic
